meanings.definition: To establish the validity of a will
meanings.sent1: The lawyer is probating the will to make sure it is real.
meanings.sent2: After someone passes away, their family may need to probate the will.
meanings.sent3: The judge chuckled as the lawyer explained the process of probating the will.
meanings.sent4: Probating a will is like shining a light on the truth hidden in legal documents.
meanings.sent5: She made probating the will seem as simple as following a recipe.

meanings.definition: The process of proving a will in court
meanings.sent1: Probating can be a lengthy process that requires legal expertise.
meanings.sent2: During probating, the court ensures the will is valid and follows the law.
meanings.sent3: The probating of the will turned into a courtroom drama with unexpected twists.
meanings.sent4: In the world of probating, truth and justice are the main characters.
meanings.sent5: The probating process is like a puzzle where each piece must fit perfectly to be complete.
